Name: Brand New Unit
rawData:
Brand New Unit was a Canadian hardcore punk band from Vancouver, British Columbia.
The band formed in 1991 near Surrey. and were commonly known as the acronym B.N.U. in the early years, as a band name logo was needed to post on a playbill.  They started by playing locally in Vancouver.
They were featured on Thrasher Skate Rock Vol. 11 and in 1992 they were winners of CITR-FM's 1882 SHiNDiG live performance contest, which awarded them some studio time.

Members: Gary Lavallee, Jinx Stringer, Ben Hughes, Gabe Mantle
